scripts.dev: set DEBUG=server:debug & cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.test: set DEBUG=server:debug & cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require babel-core/register --reporter spec --exit   tests/ --exec babel-node
scripts.test:watch: set DEBUG=server:debug & cross-env NODE_ENV=development mocha  --require babel-core/register --watch --reporter  spec   tests/ --exec babel-node
